plot outline: Grand Hali is story of a satirical take on the concept of joint family in today's age. What happens when a domestic helper purposely creates confusion and misunderstandings in a joint family for his guilty pleasure is the crux of the story.
title: Grand Hali
plot: _Grand Hali_ (qv) is story of a satirical take on the concept of joint family in today's age. What happens when a domestic helper purposely creates confusion and misunderstandings in a joint family for his guilty pleasure is the crux of the story.
